notes.text: ui5.walkthrough: Refactor tutorial to align on latest best practices
QUnit: Allow coverage watermarks configuration via frontend
sap.ui.model.*: method getPlaceholderText no longer experimental for relevant types
sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.06 and v4.18
sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataListBinding#requestFilterForMessages: filter must not refer to transient entries
sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataListBinding#getContexts: fix initial E.C.D.
Prepare for upcoming 'unload' event deprecation and deprecate APIs 'onWindowBeforeUnload', 'onWindowUnload' and 'onWindowError' in 'sap/ui/core/Component'
sap/base/i18n/Localization: Fix evaluation order of different configuration parameters for language
sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel: Allow to switch off server cache for security tokens
Table: Add rowMode aggregation
Configuration: xx-noSync parameter truthy check
ThemeManager: retrieval of xx-cssVariables parameter
Core: deprecate sap.ui.core.Core#libraryChanged event and sap.ui.core.Core.getMetadata API
sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataListBinding#loadData: read all data (up to model size limit) in "Client" mode
Deprecate Core APIs: loadLibrary, initLibrary, getLoadedLibraries, getLibraryResourceBundle
Deprecate Core.attachControlEvent and Core.detachControlEvent
Introduce Element.getActiveElement API and deprecate Core.getCurrentFocusedControlId
Introduce EventBus.getInstance singleton API and deprecate sap.ui.core.Core.getEventBus
Introduce Element.getElementById as replacement for deprecated sap.ui.getCore().byId
Introduce new StaticArea API, deprecate predecessor on Core facade
core.Core: deprecate createRenderManager()
sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataListBinding#fireCreateActivate: ignore destroyed bindings
DropInfo: correct the type of d&d related browser events
sap.ui.test.Opa5: Tweaked the AutoWaitParams sample
sap.ui.model.type.DateInterval#parseValue: no milliseconds at interval end
Table: Add rowMode aggregation
Table: Add rowMode aggregation
Fix Core Qunit tests
sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataListBinding#_getSkipAndTop: fix calculation of "iLimit"
